https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qP6gj6jqkrnw6ewQM6u6BOlDIzv.jpg Everyone carries something, some burden that weighs him down. Some are crushed, others are freed, others just carry on. Eleven characters cross each others paths, unveiling their fears and desires, during the world weightlifting championship All the Weight of the World
